flowRoot.flowPara: Calculation of the inclination of (AB) and (BC):
(D) a line going through A and with an inclination i.
a*x+b*y+c=0 is the equation of a line
B a point that verifies the equation.
Redefinition of the arc A,B,C with the two new end points D and E.
The middle point B must be redefined because it can be outside of the arc segment DE.
F is the new middle point. We choose F on the arc such as (DIF)=(FIE).
